about_the_game:
The Endless Commute

It was supposed to be another mundane journey home, but something felt off.
The people in the station moved unnaturally, like puppets on invisible strings.
The same stations seemed to appear again and again, slightly distorted with each pass.
This place… something was terribly wrong.

Your goal is to reach the 13th Station, but a single wrong move sends you back to the 1st Station.
Every decision matters, and time is running out. Escape before it's too late.

13 Endings

  • Every choice leads to one of 13 unique endings.

  • Each ending reveals fragments of the hidden truth behind the stations.

  • Track your progress as you unravel the mysteries of No Way Out: 13.

Compete with Other Players 

  • Your fastest clear time is recorded on the Leaderboard.

  • Test your skills and climb to the top against players from around the world.

Observe, Deduce, Survive

  • Observe: Pay attention to unsettling anomalies at each station.

  • Deduce: Make the right decisions to advance to the next station.

  • Survive: Escape the loop and uncover the truth before it consumes you.

name: No Way Out: 13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended for faster loading time. Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended for faster loading time. Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.

short_description: A psychological horror puzzle game set in an eerie, endlessly repeating commute. Face mysterious anomalies, make crucial decisions, and uncover the truth as you strive to escape this seemingly endless loop.
